channel.title: How do I make a client? Or Can someone make on for me?
channel.description:
wanted to know how to make my own client or if someone can make it for me I will show you people my own pic I made of it for what I want it to look like. I was thinking for about server was there a way when someone openes up client that and its linked right to my ip adress? I has second thoughts about the thing be linked to my ip adress because when I downloaded project lol v3 client it didn't work I typed in a username and pass and it said "error connecting to server" If I did somethnig like that would my server do that to?
THESE PICS ARE NOT REAL I EDITED THEM AND MADE THEM MYSELF ON MS PAINT!
[b]This is my loading pic:[/b] [IMG]http://i180.photobucket.com/albums/x303/mystickid2k6/Loadingpic.jpg[/img]
[b]This is my home pic or w/e:[/b] [IMG]http://i180.photobucket.com/albums/x303/mystickid2k6/MyownclientIdea.jpg[/img]
[b]This is my logging in pic:[/b] [IMG]http://i180.photobucket.com/albums/x303/mystickid2k6/loggingin.jpg[/img][br][size=1]Posted on: September 21, 2007, 07:08:44 AM[/size][hr]Sorry to double post but I was just wondering if someone downloaded a client and put that pic in backround(without the logging in thing just the Mupescape and pics of partyhats and my site on bottom) and then have it linked to my ip adress. Also, if anyone you people fell like helping my on my server please go to http://uppit.com/d/NIOHJ ( i wanted to a massing detector like on eyrescape and something like a lag meter)[br][size=1]Posted on: September 21, 2007, 07:14:32 AM[/size][hr]sorry now to triple post but I wish somone will please respond!

item.title: How do I make a client? Or Can someone make on for me?
item.dc:creator: @Mupescape Mupescape
item.description:
@Mupescape wrote:

wanted to know how to make my own client or if someone can make it for me I will show you people my own pic I made of it for what I want it to look like. I was thinking for about server was there a way when someone openes up client that and its linked right to my ip adress? I has second thoughts about the thing be linked to my ip adress because when I downloaded project lol v3 client it didn’t work I typed in a username and pass and it said “error connecting to server” If I did somethnig like that would my server do that to?

THESE PICS ARE NOT REAL I EDITED THEM AND MADE THEM MYSELF ON MS PAINT!

This is my loading pic:

Loadingpic.jpg827×616

This is my home pic or w/e:

This is my logging in pic:

Also, if anyone you people fell like helping my on my server please go to http://uppit.com/d/NIOHJ ( i wanted to a massing detector like on eyrescape and something like a lag meter)[br][size=1]Posted on: September 21, 2007, 07:14:32 AM[/size][hr]sorry now to triple post but I wish somone will please respond!
